title: Home Page Load and Content Verification
description: Verify that the home page loads within 2 seconds, displays the hero section, restaurant story, and editable content correctly across devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Home page fully loads in under 2 seconds
Hero section is present and visually correct
Restaurant story content is displayed and editable for admins
Page layout is responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile screens
Animations load smoothly without jank or errors

title: Menu Product List Rendering with Filters and Search
description: Verify the menu page shows at least 20 products, supports filtering by category and dietary options, and real-time search updates the product list.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu page
At least 20 product items are displayed
Apply filter to show only vegetarian products
Only vegetarian products are shown and non-vegetarian items hidden
Enter a search term that matches some products
Product list updates in real time to match search term
Clear filters and search
All products are visible again

title: Product Detail Page Content and Gallery Display
description: Verify detailed product pages show full information including images, ingredients, allergens, dietary badges, and customization options with no errors.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page from the menu
Display product name, description, price, and preparation time
Display image gallery with multiple product images
Allergen and dietary preference indicators are visible and accurate
Customization options (e.g. size, add-ons) are selectable without errors
Attempt to select customizations and verify UI updates accordingly
No broken images or missing data are present

title: Shopping Cart Add, Update Quantities, and Persistence
description: Verify items can be added to the shopping cart, quantities adjusted properly, subtotal and tax calculated correctly, and cart persists across sessions.

steps.description: Add multiple items to the shopping cart from different product pages
Cart updates immediately showing correct items and quantities
Increase and decrease quantities for each cart item
Subtotals and IGV tax are recalculated correctly for each adjustment
Reload the browser or reopen the app
Shopping cart persists with previous items and quantities intact

title: Checkout Form Validation and Order Submission
description: Verify checkout form requires all mandatory fields, validates email and phone formats, allows pickup time selection, submits successfully, and generates unique order number with confirmation.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with a filled shopping cart
Attempt to submit with empty required fields
Form shows validation errors for missing required fields
Input invalid email and phone formats
Form shows validation errors for incorrect email and phone
Select a valid pickup time within allowed ranges
Fill all fields correctly and submit order
Order is accepted, unique order number is generated, and confirmation page is displayed
User receives order confirmation email with details and estimated preparation time

title: Reservation Form Validation and Confirmation Code Delivery
description: Verify reservation form prevents selecting past dates, validates time against restaurant availability, accepts valid inputs, and sends confirmation code via email.

steps.description: Navigate to reservation page
Attempt to select a past date for table reservation
Form disables or rejects past date selection
Select a date but a time outside available hours
Form validation prevents submission and shows error about invalid time
Fill reservation form with valid future date, time, and required personal info
Submit reservation request
Reservation is accepted and confirmation page shows reservation details
Confirmation code is generated and sent to user's email

title: Admin Authentication and Route Protection
description: Verify administrators must authenticate via Supabase to access admin dashboard and all protected routes, with expired sessions handled gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to admin dashboard without logging in
User is redirected to login page
Input valid admin credentials and log in
Access granted to admin dashboard
Manually expire session token or wait for session expiration
Attempt to access protected admin routes
User is redirected to login due to expired session

title: Admin Order Management Features
description: Verify admin can filter orders by status, update order statuses, cancel orders, and view modals with order details without page reloads.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open orders management page
Filter orders by 'Pending' status
Only pending orders are listed
Select an order and update its status to 'Preparing'
Order status updates immediately without page reload
Open order details modal for a specific order
Modal displays full order info and closes properly
Cancel an order and confirm cancellation
Order status reflects cancellation and UI updates instantly

title: Admin Reservation Management Features
description: Verify admin can search, filter, update statuses of reservations, and view status tracking modals dynamically without page reloads.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to reservations management page
Search reservations by customer name or date
Reservation list updates to match search criteria
Filter reservations by status such as 'Confirmed' or 'Cancelled'
Only reservations matching the filter are visible
Update status of a reservation and save changes
Status changes are reflected immediately without page reload
Open status tracking modal for a reservation
Modal shows current reservation status and closes correctly

title: Admin Product and Category CRUD Operations with Image Handling
description: Verify admin can create, read, update, and delete products and categories with image uploads, preview functionality, validations, and quick availability toggling.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to product management section
Create a new category with required data
Category is added to list and available for product assignment
Create a new product including uploading multiple images
Image previews display correctly before submission
Attempt to upload invalid image formats or exceed size limits
Validation prevents upload and shows appropriate error messages
Save the new product and verify it appears in the product list
Toggle product availability off and verify product hidden from customer menu
Edit existing product details and save changes
Changes persist and reflect on customer-facing menu
Delete a product and confirm deletion
Product is removed from the product list and menu

title: RESTful API Endpoint Validation and Status Code Compliance
description: Verify that API endpoints for products, categories, orders, reservations return proper HTTP status codes and follow REST conventions including success, client, and server errors.

steps.description: Send GET request to products endpoint
Response status is 200 and product data is returned in expected format
Send POST request to orders endpoint with valid order data
Response status is 201 Created and order details with unique order number returned
Send PUT request to update a reservation with invalid data
Response status is 400 Bad Request and validation errors are detailed
Send DELETE request to remove a category with valid authorization
Response status is 200 OK and category is deleted
Send request to an undefined endpoint
Response status is 404 Not Found
